reviews.review_msg: Took this course a few years ago, and to this day, Barry Ledwidge stands out as my fav. professor in my university career. Classes are fun, engaged, interesting. He has a lot of experience and a lot of fun stories to relate to the topics at hand! Would recommend taking ANY course with him.
If you send him an email he will respond immediately and marks assignments quickly. He really makes an effort to make the class both educational and enjoyable.  He is also very helpful.
His videos are quite boring, his exams were pretty much all based on his notes, got an A in his class even though I only went to about 3 classes in the second half of the semester. very easy marker
contrary to what others have written here psyc 270 is very interesting. i like ledwidge's strange sense of humour and the textbook is engaging. personality psychology is NOT boring.

Sometimes difficult to understand through mumbling.  Material was boring (unbearably), but he did not bring enough depth to it through "experiences."  WORST textbook in history.  No comments about BL's other courses, but 270 is easy but boring.
Really great prof but really bad course material. Take 241 with him but try and avoid 270. It has been a waste of my life.
